description.oldValue:
Deploy teams at scale for your frontline workers
using dynamic teams in the Teams Admin Center. Dynamic teams will automate
member management to ensure your teams are always up to date.
description.newValue: ,Deploy teams at scale for your frontline workers using dynamic teams in the Teams Admin Center. Dynamic teams will automate member management to ensure your teams are always up to date. Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
